content: flat after blocking because the stitch pattern includes elongated stitches row gauge does not correspond to an exact number of full pattern repeats and is measured over several repeats and averaged **needles** 4 5 mm / us 7 needles of your preferred needle type **notions** * tapestry needle * measuring tape the pattern was tech-edited by marie-eve wedge 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/blush-trails-sweater 2 https //www youtube com/watch v=e_xicleaypy
